definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 S. sf. [[הִחְדַּקְתִּיו]] 2Sa 15:4; 3 mpl. [[הִחְדִּיקוּ]] De 25:1; Impf. 3 ms. [[יַחְדִּיק]] Is 53:11; 1 S. [[אַחְדִּיק]] Ex 23:7, Job 27:5; Inf. cstr. [[הַחְדִּיק]] 1Ki 8:32 = 2Ch 6:23; Imv. mpl. [[הַחְדִּיקוּ]] Ps 82:3; Pt. [[מַחְדִּיק]] Pr 17:15, etc.;—
do justice, in administering law 2Sa 15:4, Ps 82:3.
declare righteous, justify, c. acc. [[חַדִּיק]]([[ה]]) De 25:1, 1Ki 8:32 = 2Ch 6:23; [[רָשָׁע]] Ex 23:7 (E) Is 5:23, Pr 17:15; Justify accusers, by recognizing charge as just Job 27:5.
justify, vindicate the cause of, save, c. acc., Is 50:8 (of God), c. [[לְ]] of obj. Is 53:11 (of servant of ´[[י]]).
make righteous, turn to righteousness, Da 12:3, cf. Aboth Da 5:26, Da 5:27 Bev.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. 1 pl. [[נִחְטַדָָּק]] Ge 44:16 (J) how shall we justify ourselves, clear ourselves from suspicion?
